edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.queueapp

Class TrainRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.queueapp.TrainRoute

  • public final class TrainRoute
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a train route consisting of a pair of parallel tracks, Station(s) at fixed locations along the tracks, and Train(s) at varying locations along the tracks. Each Station serves both tracks. No two Stations are at the same location. Two trains may be at the same location however only one per track.

    NOTE: This class is incomplete - you may want to restructure it based on your implementation's requirements.

    WARNING: Some CIRCULAR route functionality is not yet implemented!

    Note: You may use this class, with or without modification, in your Comp 2000, Queue application/Train Simulation solution. You must retain all authorship comments. If you modify this, add your authorship to mine.

    Version:
    1.0.0 base version
    Author:
    David M Rosenberg

      • whichDirection

        public Direction whichDirection(int fromStationId,
                                int toStationId)
        Determines the direction an entity needs to travel to move from the 'from' station to the 'to' station. It takes into account the route style.
        Parameters:
        fromStationId - starting point station id #
        toStationId - ending point station id #
        Returns:
        the Direction in which an entity must travel

        Parameters:

        toStation - ending point station instance
        Returns:
        the Direction in which an entity must travel

      • whichDirection

        public Direction whichDirection(Location fromLocation,
                                Location toLocation)
        Determines the Direction an entity must move to travel between from and to

        WARNING: As implemented, this method only works correctly for LINEAR routes!

        Parameters:
        fromLocation - the Location at the start of travel
        toLocation - the Location at the destination
        Returns:
        the Direction in which an entity must travel
